statements: UPDATE sculptures SET sculpture_name = 'The Thinker', artist_name = 'Auguste Rodin', location = 'Museum of Modern Art', loan_status = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sculptures SET artist_name = 'Pablo Picasso', location = 'Louvre Museum', loan_status = false, sculpture_name = 'Guernica' WHERE id = 2;

UPDATE exhibitions SET start_date = '2022-09-15', end_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE exhibition_name = 'Summer Exhibition';
UPDATE sculptures SET artist='Pablo Picasso', sculpture_name='Guernica' WHERE id=1
UPDATE exhibitions SET location='Metropolitan Museum of Art', end_date='2023-09-30' WHERE id=3
